abstract.t: At first glance the acronym "OAM" seems to be well known and wellunderstood. Looking at it a bit more closely reveals a set ofrecurring problems that are revisited time and again. This documenthas one primary and a secondary goal. The primary goal is to find anunderstanding of OAM that is feasible for the MPLS Transport Profile(MPLS-TP)effort. The secondary goal is to make this understandingapplicable in a wider scope
